023
024package org.opt4j.optimizers.ea;
025
026import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Info;
027import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Parent;
028
029/**
030 * The {@link BasicMatingModule} is the basic property module for the
031 * {@link Mating} and {@link Coupler}.
032 * 
033 * @author glass
034 * 
035 */
036@Parent(EvolutionaryAlgorithmModule.class)
037@Info("Basic strategies to determine couples from the set of parents for a crossover.")
038public class BasicMatingModule extends MatingModule {
039
040        @Info("The type of couple operation")
041        protected CouplerType type = CouplerType.DEFAULT;
042
043        /**
044         * The {@link CouplerType} determines the coupler operator to use.
045         * 
046         * @author glass
047         * 
048         */
049        public enum CouplerType {
050                /**
051                 * Use the {@link CouplerDefault} operator.
052                 */
053                DEFAULT,
054                /**
055                 * Use the {@link CouplerRandom} operator.
056                 */
057                RANDOM,
058                /**
059                 * Use the {@link CouplerUnique} operator.
060                 */
061                UNIQUE;
062        }
063
064        /**
065         * Returns the type of {@link Coupler} operator to use.
066         * 
067         * @see #setType
068         * @return the the type of coupler operator to use
069         */
070        public CouplerType getType() {
071                return type;
072        }
073
074        /**
075         * Sets the the type of {@link Coupler} operator to use.
076         * 
077         * @see #getType
078         * @param type
079         *            the type to set
080         */
081        public void setType(CouplerType type) {
082                this.type = type;
083        }
084
085        /*
086         * (non-Javadoc)
087         * 
088         * @see org.opt4j.start.Opt4JModule#config()
089         */
090        @Override
091        public void config() {
092                switch (type) {
093                case RANDOM:
094                        bind(Coupler.class).to(CouplerRandom.class).in(SINGLETON);
095                        break;
096                case UNIQUE:
097                        bind(Coupler.class).to(CouplerUnique.class).in(SINGLETON);
098                        break;
099                default: // DEFAULT
100                        bind(Coupler.class).to(CouplerDefault.class).in(SINGLETON);
101                        break;
102                }
103        }
104}
